name: Feud - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Support Feud's development by grabbing a copy of the soundtrack, encoded as high-quality MP3s. This includes both the originals and the lo-fi "retro" versions from the game, all composed by the inimitable William Watson.

FULL TRACKLIST

  • 1. Feud
  • 2. The Student
  • 3. Patient Strategist
  • 4. Isolation
  • 5. The Tension Builds
  • 6. Marching to Victory
  • 7. Celebration
  • 8. Get Them Next Time
  • 9. Feud - Retro
  • 10. The Student - Retro
  • 11. Patient Strategist - Retro
  • 12. Isolation - Retro
  • 13. The Tension Builds - Retro
  • 14. Marching to Victory - Retro
  • 15. Celebration - Retro
  • 16. Get Them Next Time - Retro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires an audio player able to play .mp3 files.
